method.name: i_cal_parameter_new

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The type of #ICalParameter to be created

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalParameter according to the kind type.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_clone

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalParameter with the same properties as the @p.

method.comment: Deep clone a #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_new_from_string

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The string from which the #ICalParameter is created

returns.comment: The newly created $ICalParameter with the properties specified in the @value.

method.comment: Creates a #ICalParameter from a string of form "PARAMNAME=VALUE".

method.name: i_cal_parameter_new_from_value_string

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind of #ICalParameter to be created

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The string from which #ICalParameter to be created

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalParameter from just the value, the part after the "="

method.name: i_cal_parameter_free
method.comment: Frees the native part of the ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_as_ical_string
method.comment: Converts an #ICalParameter to the string representation.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_isa

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter to be determined for the type

method.comment: Checks the type of a #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_isa_parameter

returns.comment: true if the native part is of type icalparameter, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether the native part of the #ICalParameter is of type icalparameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_xname

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the xname to be set

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The name to be set into the @param

method.comment: Sets the xname property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_xname
method.comment: Gets the xname property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_xvalue

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the xvalue to be set

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The value to be set into the @param

method.comment: Sets the xvalue property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_xvalue
method.comment: Gets the xvalue property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_iana_name

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the iana_name to be set

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The name to be set into the @param

method.comment: Sets the iana_name property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_iana_name
method.comment: Gets the iana_name property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_iana_value

parameter.name: param
parameter.comment: The #ICalParameter of which the iana_value to be set

parameter.name: v
parameter.comment: The value to be set into the @param

method.comment: Sets the iana_value property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_iana_value
method.comment: Gets the iana_value property of the native part of the #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_has_same_name

returns.comment: true if the parameters have the same name, false or not.

method.comment: Checks whether native parts of two #ICalParameters have the same name.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_kind_to_string
method.comment: Converts the #ICalParameter to the string representation.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_kind_from_string
method.comment: Converts a string to the #ICalParameterKind.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_kind_is_valid

returns.comment: true if valid, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether #ICalParameterKind is valid.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_kind_value_kind

parameter.name: out_is_multivalued
parameter.comment: location to store whether the parameter is multivalued, or %NULL to ignore

method.comment: Converts the @kind into an #ICalValueKind and optionally returns whether the @kind is a multivalued parameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_is_multivalued

returns.comment: whether the@param is a multivalued parameter

method.comment: Returns whether the @param is a multivalued parameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_decode_value
method.comment: Converts the @value according to RFC 6868, changing the @value itself.
